code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import Carousel from'react-bootstrap/Carousel';import img1 from'../assets/images/Front_View.jpg';import img2 from'../assets/images/Side_View.jpg';import img3 from'../assets/images/lecture.jpg';import img4 from'../assets/images/Mess.jpg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const images=[{src:img1,caption:'Campus View Front'},{src:img2,caption:'Campus View Side'},{src:img3,caption:'Lab Session 1'},{src:img4,caption:'Lab Session 2'}];function HomeSlider(){const[index,setIndex]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{const timer=setInterval(()=>setIndex(i=>(i+1)%images.length),3500);return()=>clearInterval(timer);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel,{activeIndex:index,onSelect:setIndex,fade:true,interval:null,children:images.map((img,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Carousel.Item,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"d-block w-100",src:img.src,alt:img.caption,style:{maxHeight:'520px',objectFit:'fill'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel.Caption,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:img.caption})})]},idx))});}export default HomeSlider;
